original: Danver, Carl-Gustav, lektor, Karlskrona, f. 2/10/08 i Ronneby. G. 46 m. skolkökslär. Inga Britta Larsson. Barn (i tid. äkt.) : Ingrid f. 40. — Stud:ex. i Karlskrona 27, fil. mag. i Lund 33, fil. lic. 38, fil. dr 42, provår 43-44. Stud:res. t. Tyskl. o. Danm. Aman. v. Lunds observat. 36-42. Tim-lär. v. Lunds folkskisem. 38-39, e. adj. i Kristianstad 42-43, timlär. v. Sthlms tekn. aftonsk. 43-44, e. adj. v. Karlskrona h. a. 1. 44, lektor i matem. o. fysik där sed. 45. Skr.: ett ant. vet:-skapl. avh. o. upps.
translated: Danver, Carl-Gustav, lecturer, Karlskrona, b. October 2, 1908 in Ronneby. Married in 1946 to a school kitchen teacher, Inga Britta Larsson. Children (from previous marriage): Ingrid b. 1940. Education: graduated from high school in Karlskrona in 1927, earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Lund in 1933, Master of Arts in 1938, doctorate in philosophy in 1942, probationary year from 1943-1944. Studied abroad in Germany and Denmark. Assistant at Lund Observatory from 1936-1942. Part-time teacher at Lund's folk high school from 1938-1939, substitute teacher in Kristianstad from 1942-1943, part-time teacher at Stockholm's technical evening school from 1943-1944, substitute teacher at Karlskrona's naval academy in 1944, lecturer in mathematics and physics there since 1945. Published several scientific papers and essays.
